recipes.title: Bolognese lasagna
steps: Mince the onions. Crush the garlic cloves. Finely chop carrot and celery.
Sauté cloves of garlic and onions in a little olive oil.
then the meat and bring everything back.
After a few minutes, add the red wine. Cook until evaporated.
Add tomato puree , water and herbs.
Season with salt and pepper and simmer for 45 minutes.
Prepare the béchamel : melt the butter,
then, out of the fire, add the flour at once.
Put back on the heat and stir with a whisk until a smooth mixture is obtained.
Add the milk little by little.
Stir constantly, until the mixture thickens.
Then perfume with nutmeg , salt and pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes, over very low heat, stirring. Book.
Oil the lasagna dish . Lay a thin layer of béchamel then:
and that 3 times in a row.
On the last layer of lasagna, put only béchamel and cover with grated cheese. Sprinkle a few hazelnuts with butter.

recipes.title: Filet mignon in crust
steps: Sauté in a pan with 20 g of butter for about 3 minutes. Remove from the sauté pan and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté the tenderloins on each side.
Cook for 10 minutes over low heat.
Reincorporate the onions. Continue cooking for 5 minutes. Salt, pepper. Book.
Place on each dough two slices of ham and 100 g of Gruyère cheese . Salt and pepper.
Put a fillet on each dough and top with onion sauce.
Fold the dough around the meat and solder the edges with the beaten egg yolk and a food brush.

recipes.title: Easy veal blanquette
steps: Brown the meat in a little butter until the pieces are a little golden.
Sprinkle with 2 spoons of flour. Stir well.
Add 2 or 3 glasses of water, the bouillon cubes, the wine and stir. Add water if necessary to cover.
Cut the carrots into slices and mince the onions, then add them to the meat and the mushrooms.
Simmer on very low heat about 1:30 to 2:00 stirring.
If necessary, add water from time to time.
In a bowl, mix well the cream, the egg yolk and the lemon juice. Add this mixture at the last moment, stir well and serve immediately.
